text: "Keep On Loving You" is a 1980 song by American soft rock band REO Speedwagon and is the leading song from their ninth studio album Hi Infidelity. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada and number 3 in Australia and South Africa. It also went to number 7 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Soft rock songs
title: Keep On Loving You (song)
